MajorClaims.Text: If a university plans to develop a new research in my country and I have to choose between establishing a centre for business research or a centre for agriculture research, I would opt for the second one

My country need to focus more on the agriculture by establishing centers for research in this field, which will have some very positive consequences on agriculture people work, on the economy and on the employment

Claims.Text: The centre for research in agriculture can help my co-citizens to better exploit these land
This centre can also help people there to solve their issues related to their land
the centre for research in agriculture helps the economy of my country to improve
Another reason that makes the centre of research for the agriculture more important than the centre of business research is that the first one can create a lot of jobs
a centre of business research is more important

Premises.Text: my country has a lot of land which is useful for the agriculture
Most of these lands are left without any treatment
Especially, if they have no knowledge or education in this field
The agriculture field has only thirty percent as a market part
The centre of research can raise the market part of this field by developing the agriculture products
the dates are the most important agriculture product in my country
The centre of research for agriculture can make some research in how to get a good quality of this product, how to treat the Palme and maybe how to treat the land of the palms
showing people how to exploit a land and get good agriculture products will push people to think about working in the field of agriculture rather than working in business or other field to make money
we have to be in parallel with the advanced countries which have focused in business field

being a developed country does not mean that we have to focus only in business, but we have to focus on what really bring us to the level of self satisfaction, and the agriculture for our country is the field that can realize that
